body:
@alykhantejani yes, as we discussed offline, I think removing the `weight` viewing/expansion will be enough, and let the broadcasting do the work for us.
Note that we could possibly do the same thing for `bce_loss`, but we would need to use some internal functions to perform the broadcasting (as the tensors are used in a C function)
